definition: Sloping land (especially the slope beside a body of water)
examples: They pulled the canoe up on the bank

definition: An organization to gain political power
examples: In 1992 Perot tried to organize a third party at the national level
She asked how to avoid kissing at the end of a date

definition: The upper part of the human body or the front part of the body in animals; contains the face and brains
examples: He stuck his head out the window
Police tried to break up the gang; a pack of thieves
